pages.text: Storing information, either through a $(thing)Scribing Table$() or a $(thing)Book and Quill$(), is a very useful ability. $(br2)In order to do so, you need a Quill.
The first step to making a quill is to trim the lower bristles off of the feather.
Next, soak the feather in water.
Afterwards, heat up some sand to $(7)$(bold)Very Hot**$() and craft it with the feather in order to temper it.
Finally, craft the feather with a knife again to carve out the tip and finish the quill.
Quills are needed to craft Scribing Tables and Book and Quills.
